description: Bella Rossi LOVES the start of a new season. A new season means new meat and new meat means she gets to show her sexual supremacy to any of those who dare to challenge her on the mats. Today the fresh meat is Nikki "Road Warrior" Hearts. Nikki has NO wrestling experience but she is very scrappy so she's confident she will do pretty well against the Annihilator. She's even planning on making her very own signature round 4 move to try to Bella Today.
title: Bella Rossi takes on scrappy new cummer Nikki Hearts.
